text.the_towers.cannot_drop_armor: You cannot drop your team's armor!
text.the_towers.cannot_place: You cannot place a block here!
text.the_towers.guide.craft_stuff: Craft your stuff using the materials in the chests!
text.the_towers.guide.jumping_into_pool: Jumping into an team's pool will remove a health point from that team.
text.the_towers.guide.protect_your_pool: Be sure to protect your pool carefully!
text.the_towers.health_removed: %s removed a health point from the %s team!
text.the_towers.health_stole: %s stole a health point from the %s team!
